ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "AE1"), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Sites IS AE1")), RecordTypeId = "0121a000000eOkY", NOT(ISPICKVAL( Account.Industry,"Government - Federal" )),NOT(ISPICKVAL( Account.Industry,"Government - State & Local")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Account.Industry, "Education - Higher Ed")),NOT(ISPICKVAL( Account.Industry, "Education - K-12")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot create a free trial opportunity
